name: Flyout Menu Awesome by Themes Awesome
author: Themes Awesome

sections.description:
Flyout Menu Awesome – Vertical Slide Menu WordPress Plugin

Flyout Menu Awesome is an awesome WordPress Flyout Menu Plugin that helps You to create the a WordPress menu interface element into your WordPress Site with custom layouts and effects. Flyout Menu Awesome is easy to use with extensive choice of 3d layout styles.

Check Flyout Menu Awesome Demos

Flyout Menu Demo

Flyout Menu Awesome Feature

Flyout Menu Pro || Read Documentation || View Demo

  • Custom Menu Background
  • 3 Types of Menus
  • Custom Menu Label
  • Extensive Options
  • Fully Customized
  • Unlimited Colors
  • Fonts Colors
  • Tested on all Modern Browser
  • Responsive

Get More Features On Pro

Flyout Menu Pro

  • More Flyout Menu Interface Styles
  • More Flyout Menu Details Style
sections.faq:
Is there a time period for using Flyout Menu?

No, you can use Flyout Menu onwards.

Does it work with any theme?

Absolutely! Flyout Menu will Works With Any Theme

What if I update to Flyout Menu to Pro?

Your existing content will work with Flyout Menu PRO. So you wonâ€™t lose your contents.

How do I translate the plugin?

We recommended Loco Translate for translate.for details on how to use it you can read our online documentation.
